Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

So I'm trying to get Firespitter to show up in my vab but only the cockpit and one or two other parts are (I'm looking for the motors/propellers). I installed RP-1/RO/RSS via ckan using the rp-1 express installer and Firespitter was also via ckan. I see within the realism overhaul mod folder there is a subfolder named "suggested mods" and then a Firespitter folder within that seems to have a config in it but I'm not sure if I need to do something with this orbit can read the config from that location. Seems to be that rp-1 or RO is causing it to not show up. Can someone point me in the correct direction? This one is causing me some headaches..

 

Thanks,

Mark
